title: pAhi janani
sahitya:
pAhi janani santatam mAmihAmila pariNata vidhuvadanE


anupallavi

  devi sakala shubhadE himAcala kanyE sAhasika dAruNa caNDamuNDa nAshini


caraNam 1    bAla sOma dAriNi parama krpAvati nIlavArida nibha nEtrE rucira shIlE 
phAla lasita vara pAtIra tilakE shrI nIlakNTha dayitE nigama vana mAtangi
    caraNam 2    surabhi kusuma rAji shObhita kaca brndE varadE vAsava mukha vandyamAna caraNE 
aruNa japA kusumAdharE kaumUdI paramOjvala hasitE bhakta kalpalatikE
    caraNam 3    kamanIyatama rUpE kanyAkubja vAsini shamita pApa nikarE shAnta hrdaya gEhE 
amita vimala rucihArE nIla vAridOpama vENi shrI padmanAbha sOdari
